name: Craps-Shooter
summary:
Craps Shooter Free is available for trial use.

The easiest and fastest craps game available.
A Vegas rules casino craps game.
True 3D physics simulation of dice rolling.
There are no precomputed dice animations.
Virtually unlimited dice roll simulations.
Easy to click table layout simulates real casino craps. Quick betting. 
Choose your table limit, table odds, and starting bankroll.
